name: Sprawl I (Flatland)
wikiSummary: The Sprawl I (Flatland) Songfacts says: On this minor key piano lamenting change and modernization, frontman Win Butler revisits the town where he grow up. "I took a drive into the sprawl to find the house where we used to stay in," he recalls. However, Butler fails to locate various childhood haunts that are imprinted on his memory.
